divs: Sighting Detailsit was may 20,2012, around 1:28. me and my stepson was outside taking pictures and i just happen to look upward with the camera and seen this object near the sun. i thought it maybe the moon. so i looked again and said the moon is not that color in the day, nor night. i showed the picture to my girlfreind and she said it was nonsense. so i go back outside again and look and i see the same object on the otherside of the sun. "very strange" i said. i have an iphone 3gs that has an otto case on it. so thinking that may have something to do with it, i took it off. still the same. so now im on the deck of the mobile home in front and look up in the same place and i see two objects, side by side. im thinking"wow!" it was amazing.the two obects just stayed there. when i came back outside and looked up, they were gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lincolnton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: was outside taking pictures and looked up. seen one object first, the looked around seen other object
